name: graceful
content:
graceful adjective
(MOVEMENT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 moving in a smooth, relaxed, attractive way, or having a smooth, attractive shape: graceful movements a graceful neck
More examplesFewer examplesThe gazelle is one of the swiftest and most graceful of animals.She is a wonderfully graceful dancer.He admired the graceful proportions of the Georgian architecture.The trees, slender and graceful, swayed gently above us.With a silent, graceful dive, she disappeared beneath the surface of the lake.
